thread.title: Syracuse football at Virginia: Live updates, fan chat with Brent Axe
thread.title_full: Syracuse football at Virginia: Live updates, fan chat with Brent Axe

author: Brent Axe | baxe@syracuse.com
title: Syracuse football at Virginia: Live updates, fan chat with Brent Axe
text:
The Syracuse football team will face Virginia at 3:30 p.m. Saturday at Scott Stadium in Charlottesville, Va. The game can be seen on the YES Network in Central New York. 
Refresh this page frequently to get scoring updates and in-game analysis from our team of football writers. 
You can also join the conversation below in the comments section . Brent Axe will be chatting with fans. You'll also be able to see Twitter updates from our writers at the game in the comments section.
